DOC.brief_summary: This is a before-after phase II study, according to the Medical Research Council framework, investigating the feasibility of introducing the Liverpool Care Pathway for the dying patient (LCP) in 5 Ligurian hospices.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Quality of Care for the Dying Patient in Hospice: A Quasi Experimental Trial in Liguria Region
DOC.criteria: All patients deceased in the hospice during the evaluation period Approval of ethics committee Prior use of LCP in the hospice Deceased was a relative of a hospice member of staff
